    org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.ganttchart  

    • Uses of ISettings in org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.ganttchart

      Subinterfaces of ISettings in org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.ganttchart 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ISettings2
      This interface is an extension of ISettings which lets you define various settings for the GanttChart.
